languages.text: "Со временем я вымету с Футфола всю расплодившуюся на нем заразу. И богобоязненность, верность и преданность вновь будут царить на этой станции под взором Его".

"In due time, I shall weed out all the taint that has bred here on Footfall for so long. And then pious fear, loyalty, and devotion will once again become the pillars of this station under His watchful eye."
languages.original_text: "Со временем я вымету с Футфола всю расплодившуюся на нем заразу. И богобоязненность, верность и преданность вновь будут царить на этой станции под взором Его".

traits.locale_text: "In due time, I will weed out all the taint that has bred here on Footfall for so long. And then pious fear, loyalty, and devotion will once again become the pillars of this station under His watchful eye."

"In due time, I shall weed out all the taint that has bred here on Footfall for so long. And then pious fear, loyalty, and devotion will once again become the pillars of this station under His watchful eye."

languages.text: “总有一天，我会消灭落脚港滋生已久的所有污点。到了那个时候，在神皇的注视下，虔诚之人的恐惧、忠诚与奉献将会再次成为这座星站的支柱。”
languages.original_text: "In due time, I shall weed out all the taint that has bred here on Footfall for so long. And then pious fear, loyalty, and devotion will once again become the pillars of this station under His watchful eye."

traits.locale_text: “总有一天，我会消灭落脚港滋生已久的所有污点。到了那个时候，在神皇的注视下，虔诚之人的恐惧、忠诚与奉献将会再次成为这座星站的支柱。”

languages.text: 「その内、今までフットフォールで広がっていた汚れを、すべて排除する。そうすれば再び主の監視下で、敬虔な恐れ、忠誠心、そして献身がこのステーションの柱となるだろう」
languages.original_text: "In due time, I shall weed out all the taint that has bred here on Footfall for so long. And then pious fear, loyalty, and devotion will once again become the pillars of this station under His watchful eye."

traits.locale_text: 「その内、今までフットフォールで広がっていた汚れを、すべて排除する。そうすれば再び主の監視下で、敬虔な恐れ、忠誠心、そして献身がこのステーションの柱となるだろう」

languages.text: «Poco a poco acabaré con la corrupción que se ha reproducido en Paso durante tanto tiempo. Entonces, el temor, la lealtad y la devoción volverán a ser los pilares de esta estación bajo Su atenta mirada».
languages.original_text: "In due time, I shall weed out all the taint that has bred here on Footfall for so long. And then pious fear, loyalty, and devotion will once again become the pillars of this station under His watchful eye."

traits.locale_text: «Poco a poco acabaré con la corrupción que se ha reproducido en Paso durante tanto tiempo. Entonces, el temor, la lealtad y la devoción volverán a ser los pilares de esta estación bajo Su atenta mirada».

languages.text: "Mit der Zeit werde ich sämtliche Verderbnis ausmerzen, die schon viel zu lange hier auf Footfall wuchert. Und dann werden fromme Frucht, Loyalität und Hingabe wieder zu den Grundpfeilern dieser Station werden, unter seinem wachsamen Auge."
languages.original_text: "In due time, I shall weed out all the taint that has bred here on Footfall for so long. And then pious fear, loyalty, and devotion will once again become the pillars of this station under His watchful eye."

traits.locale_text: "Mit der Zeit werde ich sämtliche Verderbnis ausmerzen, die schon viel zu lange hier auf Footfall wuchert. Und dann werden fromme Frucht, Loyalität und Hingabe wieder zu den Grundpfeilern dieser Station werden, unter seinem wachsamen Auge."

languages.text: « En temps voulu, j'éradiquerai toute la souillure qui empoisonne Castel depuis si longtemps. Ensuite, la piété, la loyauté et la dévotion redeviendront les fondements de cette station sous Son œil vigilant. »
languages.original_text: "In due time, I shall weed out all the taint that has bred here on Footfall for so long. And then pious fear, loyalty, and devotion will once again become the pillars of this station under His watchful eye."

traits.locale_text: « En temps voulu, j'éradiquerai toute la souillure qui empoisonne Castel depuis si longtemps. Ensuite, la piété, la loyauté et la dévotion redeviendront les fondements de cette station sous Son œil vigilant. »

languages.text: "Zaman içerisinde, Binliman'a uzun süredir kök salmakta olan tüm pisliği söküp atacağız. Ardından bu istasyonda, O'nun koruyucu gözetminin altında bir kez daha ilahi korku, sadakat ve adanmışlık hüküm sürecek."
languages.original_text: "In due time, I shall weed out all the taint that has bred here on Footfall for so long. And then pious fear, loyalty, and devotion will once again become the pillars of this station under His watchful eye."

traits.locale_text: "Zaman içerisinde, Binliman'a uzun süredir kök salmakta olan tüm pisliği söküp atacağız. Ardından bu istasyonda, O'nun koruyucu gözetminin altında bir kez daha ilahi korku, sadakat ve adanmışlık hüküm sürecek."
